title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 338.3 - Retirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 338.3 - Retirement

State Regulations

The services of academic and professional employees may
be terminated at any time for age or for physical or mental incapacity in
accordance with Title D of Part 339 of this Subchapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
338.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
